department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Fresh bread and bakery products for Correctional Service of Canada
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 18 July 2024 at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf the Correctional Service of Canada, has a requirement for geographically zone based Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply, delivery and offloading of various quantities of Fresh Bread and bakery products to kitchens, on an  as and when requested basis for the period of the Standing Offer.

full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title & Reference Number

*   **English Title:** 21501-237561 – Fresh Bread – CSC
*   **French Title:** 21501-237561 – Pain frais – CSC
*   **Reference Number:** WS4576387356-Doc4576437736

### Tender Details

+   **Amendment Number:** 2
+   **Solicitation Number:** WS4576387356
+   **Publication Date:** 2024-05-29
+   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-18T14:00:00
+   **Amendment Date:** 2024-06-11
+   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-09-01
+   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-08-31
+   **Tender Status:** Cancelled
+   **UNSPSC Codes:** 50180000, 50193300 (Bread and bakery products, Flour tortillas)
+   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Classified as 'GD') (Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada)
+   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
+   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
+   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
+   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Location

+   The contract will be implemented in the provinces of Saskatchewan, Manitoba, and Alberta. The purchaser is located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

### Contracting Entity Details
+   The contracting entity is Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
+   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
+   End-User Entity Details:
    *   Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
    *   Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada

### Contact Information
+   Contact: Gostev, Tanya (SPAC/PSPC)
+   Email: tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
+   Phone: Not available
+   Fax: Not available

### Documents
+   The source tender notice can be found at <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19859960?
